skills.name: Spiraling Whirl
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>, creates 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Spirit-Serpent's Blessing</color>.

skills.name: Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Dendro Spirit-Serpent
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Once each Match, attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127032]</color> to this character.\n(Characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C127032]</color> equipped can use the Technique: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S1270321]</color>)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>. Once each Match, attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent</color> to this character.\n(Characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent</color> equipped can use the Technique: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Viny Razorscale</color>)
skills.description:
Deals 4 Dendro DMG. Once each Match, attaches Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent to this character.
(Characters with Spirit of Omen: Dendro Spirit-Serpent equipped can use the Technique: Viny Razorscale)

skills.name: Spirit of Omen's Power
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes DMG:</color> If this character has no more than 7 HP, they gain 1 $[K310]. (Once per Round)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character takes DMG:</color> If this character has no more than 7 HP, they gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>. (Once per Round)
skills.description: (Passive) After this character takes DMG: If this character has no more than 7 HP, they gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)
